verses.verse: A <S%H4210>Psalm<s%> of <S%H8426>praise.<s%> Make a joyful <S%H7321>noise<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> ye <S%H776>lands.<s%>

Know <S%H3045><s%> ye <S%H3588>that<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1931>he<s%> is <S%H430>God:<s%> it is <S%H1931>he<s%> that hath <S%H6213>made<s%> us, and <S%H3808>not<s%> we <S%H587>ourselves;<s%> we are his <S%H5971>people,<s%> and the <S%H6629>sheep<s%> of his <S%H4830>pasture.<s%>

Enter <S%H935><s%> into his <S%H8179>gates<s%> with <S%H8426>thanksgiving,<s%> and into his <S%H2691>courts<s%> with <S%H8416>praise:<s%> be <S%H3034>thankful<s%> unto him, and <S%H1288>bless<s%> his <S%H8034>name.<s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> is <S%H2896>good;<s%> his <S%H2617>mercy<s%> is <S%H5769>everlasting;<s%> and his <S%H530>truth<s%> endureth <S%H5704>to<s%> all <S%H1755>generations.<s%> <S%H1755><s%>
